Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v4 (PVA)
Workflow.Description: This flow retrieves Power Virtual Agents (bot) information. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment. Turning on this flow is optional. Only turn this flow on if a tenant-level overview of chatbots is important.
